name: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Ice Cold Paint Jobs Pack
detailed_description:
Customize your truck with a choice of six cool and snowy paint jobs!

Paint schemes included:

  • Happy Snowman

  • Northern Lights

  • Glittering Snowflake

  • Cold Mystery

  • Mighty Polar Bear

  • Night Wolf

  • Snowman

All of these cool themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class
  • DirectX®: 10
  • Hard Drive: 80 MB available space
  • Sound: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class
  • DirectX®: 10
  • Hard Drive: 80 MB available space
  • Sound: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8+ (Mountain Lion)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT-class equivalent
  • Hard Drive: 80 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.8+ (Mountain Lion)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class or better
  • Hard Drive: 80 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class
  • recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably with ETS2)
  • Hard Drive: 80 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 760-class
  • recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably with ETS2)
  • Hard Drive: 80 MB available space
